About The Company

Since 1990

In the industry

7 timezones

We work worldwide

From sourcing the worldâ€™s finest estate-grown Mandeheling coffees in the remote, mist-shrouded volcanic highlands of North Sumatra, and in doing so ensuring that farmers are treated and paid fairly, to helping a three-generation Indian premium cashew processing enterprise grow to the next level while investing to build strong local communities, MarthaMax Corporation is committed to people and planet first through social enterprise trust. Through legacy-building we find great fulfillment and do it well by creating added value in all that we do.
